thoughts.text: I think it would be a good idea to use the 'generate_image' command to generate an image of a river and save it to the new directory 'river_files'.

thoughts.plan: - Use the 'generate_image' command to generate an image of a river and save it to the 'river_files' directory.

args.prompt: Generate an image of a river and save it to the 'river_files' directory.
